forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
